"ウィンディラの翼角の調達":
"Do you remember how I used the horns of
the Dragonkin in the cuevas volcanicas to
make my own spices? It occurs to me the
Dragonkin of the Skyscape have
their own flavor. So the horns probably
taste different too! I can barely
contain myself thinking about it!
<%me>, please, grant my wish!

※ Cae de Nv.34+ Windiras."
